-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Haskell suite for the Elastic Transcoder service
--   
--   This suite extends the aws suite for the Amazon Web Services (AWS) to
--   interface the AWS Elastic Transcoder service for transcoding video.
@package aws-elastic-transcoder
@version 0.2.0.0

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Json.Types

-- | Aws.S3 uses Text for object keys
type S3Object = Text

-- | SNS Topics represented by Text values
type SNSTopic = Text
emptySNSTopic :: SNSTopic

-- | IAM Role represented by Yext
type IAMRole = Text

-- | Job Identifiers
newtype JobId
JobId :: Text -> JobId
_JobId :: JobId -> Text

-- | Preset Identifiers
newtype PresetId
PresetId :: Text -> PresetId
_PresetId :: PresetId -> Text

-- | Page Tokens
newtype PageToken
PageToken :: Text -> PageToken
_PageToken :: PageToken -> Text

-- | Job Specifications
data JobSpec
JobSpec :: JSInput -> JSOutput -> PipelineId -> JobSpec
jsInput :: JobSpec -> JSInput
jsOutput :: JobSpec -> JSOutput
jsPipelineId :: JobSpec -> PipelineId

-- | Job Single
newtype JobSingle
JobSingle :: JobSpecId -> JobSingle
jsJob :: JobSingle -> JobSpecId

-- | Job List
data JobList
JobList :: [JobSpecId] -> TextOrNull -> JobList
jlJobs :: JobList -> [JobSpecId]
jlNextPageToken :: JobList -> TextOrNull

-- | Job Specifications with JobId &amp; Status
data JobSpecId
JobSpecId :: JobId -> JSInput -> JSOutputStatus -> PipelineId -> JobSpecId
jsiId :: JobSpecId -> JobId
jsiInput :: JobSpecId -> JSInput
jsiOutput :: JobSpecId -> JSOutputStatus
jsiPipelineId :: JobSpecId -> PipelineId

-- | Job Input Parameters
data JSInput
JSInput :: S3Object -> FrameRate -> Resolution -> AspectRatio -> AutoBool -> Container -> JSInput
jsiKey :: JSInput -> S3Object
jsiFrameRate :: JSInput -> FrameRate
jsiResolution :: JSInput -> Resolution
jsiAspectRatio :: JSInput -> AspectRatio
jsiInterlaced :: JSInput -> AutoBool
jsiContainer :: JSInput -> Container

-- | Job Output Parameters
data JSOutput
JSOutput :: S3Object -> Text -> Rotate -> PresetId -> JSOutput
jsoKey :: JSOutput -> S3Object
jsoThumbnailPattern :: JSOutput -> Text
jsoRotate :: JSOutput -> Rotate
jsoPresetId :: JSOutput -> PresetId

-- | Job Output Parameters with Status
data JSOutputStatus
JSOutputStatus :: S3Object -> Maybe Text -> Rotate -> PresetId -> Status -> TextOrNull -> JSOutputStatus
jsosKey :: JSOutputStatus -> S3Object
jsosThumbnailPattern :: JSOutputStatus -> Maybe Text
jsosRotate :: JSOutputStatus -> Rotate
jsosPresetId :: JSOutputStatus -> PresetId
jsosStatus :: JSOutputStatus -> Status
jsosStatusDetail :: JSOutputStatus -> TextOrNull

-- | Input Frame Rate
data FrameRate
FRauto :: FrameRate
FR10 :: FrameRate
FR15 :: FrameRate
FR23_97 :: FrameRate
FR24 :: FrameRate
FR25 :: FrameRate
FR29_97 :: FrameRate
FR30 :: FrameRate
FR60 :: FrameRate

-- | Input Resolution
data Resolution
Rauto :: Resolution
Rpixels :: (Int, Int) -> Resolution

-- | Input Aspect Ratio
data AspectRatio
ARauto :: AspectRatio
AR1_1 :: AspectRatio
AR4_3 :: AspectRatio
AR3_2 :: AspectRatio
AR16_9 :: AspectRatio

-- | Input Container Type
data Container
Cauto :: Container
C3gp :: Container
Casf :: Container
Cavi :: Container
Cdivx :: Container
Cflv :: Container
Cmkv :: Container
Cmov :: Container
Cmp4 :: Container
Cmpeg :: Container
Cmpeg_ps :: Container
Cmpeg_ts :: Container
Cmxf :: Container
Cogg :: Container
Cvob :: Container
Cwav :: Container
Cwebm :: Container

-- | Output Rotation
data Rotate
ROTauto :: Rotate
ROT0 :: Rotate
ROT90 :: Rotate
ROT180 :: Rotate
ROT270 :: Rotate

-- | Job Status
data Status
STSSubmitted :: Status
STSProgressing :: Status
STSComplete :: Status
STSCancelled :: Status
STSError :: Status
status_t :: Status -> Text

-- | PipelineName
newtype PipelineName
PipelineName :: Text -> PipelineName
_PipelineName :: PipelineName -> Text

-- | PipelineId
newtype PipelineId
PipelineId :: Text -> PipelineId
_PipelineId :: PipelineId -> Text

-- | Pipeline
data Pipeline
Pipeline :: PipelineName -> S3Object -> S3Object -> IAMRole -> Notifications -> Pipeline
plnName :: Pipeline -> PipelineName
plnInputBucket :: Pipeline -> S3Object
plnOutputBucket :: Pipeline -> S3Object
plnRole :: Pipeline -> IAMRole
plnNotifications :: Pipeline -> Notifications

-- | Pipeline Single
newtype PipelineSingle
PipelineSingle :: PipelineIdStatus -> PipelineSingle
psPipeline :: PipelineSingle -> PipelineIdStatus

-- | Pipeline List
data PipelineList
PipelineList :: [PipelineIdStatus] -> PipelineList
plPipelines :: PipelineList -> [PipelineIdStatus]

-- | PipelineIdStatus
data PipelineIdStatus
PipelineIdStatus :: PipelineName -> S3Object -> S3Object -> IAMRole -> Notifications -> PipelineId -> PipelineStatus -> PipelineIdStatus
pisName :: PipelineIdStatus -> PipelineName
pisInputBucket :: PipelineIdStatus -> S3Object
pisOutputBucket :: PipelineIdStatus -> S3Object
pisRole :: PipelineIdStatus -> IAMRole
pisNotifications :: PipelineIdStatus -> Notifications
pisId :: PipelineIdStatus -> PipelineId
pisStatus :: PipelineIdStatus -> PipelineStatus

-- | Notifications
data Notifications
Notifications :: SNSTopic -> SNSTopic -> SNSTopic -> SNSTopic -> Notifications
ntfCompleted :: Notifications -> SNSTopic
ntfError :: Notifications -> SNSTopic
ntfProgressing :: Notifications -> SNSTopic
ntfWarning :: Notifications -> SNSTopic

-- | PipelineStatus
type PipelineStatus = Text
pipelineStatusActive :: PipelineStatus
pipelineStatusPaused :: PipelineStatus

-- | PipelineIdAndStatus
data PipelineIdAndStatus
PipelineIdAndStatus :: PipelineId -> PipelineStatus -> PipelineIdAndStatus
pasId :: PipelineIdAndStatus -> PipelineId
pasStatus :: PipelineIdAndStatus -> PipelineStatus

-- | PipelineIdAndNotifications
data PipelineIdAndNotifications
PipelineIdAndNotifications :: PipelineId -> Notifications -> PipelineIdAndNotifications
panId :: PipelineIdAndNotifications -> PipelineId
panNotifications :: PipelineIdAndNotifications -> Notifications

-- | RoleTest
data RoleTest
RoleTest :: S3Object -> S3Object -> IAMRole -> [SNSTopic] -> RoleTest
rtInputBucket :: RoleTest -> S3Object
rtOutputBucket :: RoleTest -> S3Object
rtRole :: RoleTest -> IAMRole
rtTopics :: RoleTest -> [SNSTopic]

-- | PresetName
newtype PresetName
PresetName :: Text -> PresetName
_PresetName :: PresetName -> Text

-- | Preset
data Preset
Preset :: PresetName -> Text -> Container -> Audio -> Video -> Thumbnails -> Preset
prName :: Preset -> PresetName
prDescription :: Preset -> Text
prContainer :: Preset -> Container
prAudio :: Preset -> Audio
prVideo :: Preset -> Video
prThumbnails :: Preset -> Thumbnails

-- | PresetSingle
newtype PresetSingle
PresetSingle :: PresetResponse -> PresetSingle
psPreset :: PresetSingle -> PresetResponse

-- | PresetList
data PresetList
PresetList :: [PresetResponse] -> PresetList
plPresets :: PresetList -> [PresetResponse]

-- | PresetResponse
data PresetResponse
PresetResponse :: PresetName -> Text -> Container -> Audio -> Video -> Thumbnails -> PresetId -> PresetType -> Text -> PresetResponse
prrName :: PresetResponse -> PresetName
prrDescription :: PresetResponse -> Text
prrContainer :: PresetResponse -> Container
prrAudio :: PresetResponse -> Audio
prrVideo :: PresetResponse -> Video
prrThumbnails :: PresetResponse -> Thumbnails
prrId :: PresetResponse -> PresetId
prrType :: PresetResponse -> PresetType
prrWarning :: PresetResponse -> Text

-- | Audio
data Audio
Audio :: AudioCodec -> SampleRate -> BitRate -> Channels -> Audio
auCodec :: Audio -> AudioCodec
auSampleRate :: Audio -> SampleRate
auBitRate :: Audio -> BitRate
auChannels :: Audio -> Channels

-- | Video
data Video
Video :: VideoCodec -> CodecOptions -> KeyFrameRate -> FixedGOP -> BitRate -> FrameRate -> Resolution -> AspectRatio -> Video
vdCodec :: Video -> VideoCodec
vdCodecOptions :: Video -> CodecOptions
vdKeyFrameRateDist :: Video -> KeyFrameRate
vdFixedGOP :: Video -> FixedGOP
vdBitRate :: Video -> BitRate
vdFrameRate :: Video -> FrameRate
vdResolution :: Video -> Resolution
vdAspectRatio :: Video -> AspectRatio

-- | Thumbnails
data Thumbnails
Thumbnails :: ThumbnailFormat -> Interval -> Resolution -> AspectRatio -> Thumbnails
thFormat :: Thumbnails -> ThumbnailFormat
thInterval :: Thumbnails -> Interval
thResolution :: Thumbnails -> Resolution
thAspectRatio :: Thumbnails -> AspectRatio

-- | CodecOptions
data CodecOptions
CodecOptions :: Profile -> Level -> MaxReferenceFrames -> CodecOptions
coProfile :: CodecOptions -> Profile
coLevel :: CodecOptions -> Level
coMaxReferenceFrames :: CodecOptions -> MaxReferenceFrames

-- | AudioCodec
data AudioCodec
AC_AAC :: AudioCodec

-- | SampleRate
data SampleRate
SRauto :: SampleRate
SR22050 :: SampleRate
SR32050 :: SampleRate
SR44100 :: SampleRate
SR48000 :: SampleRate
SR96000 :: SampleRate

-- | Channels
data Channels
Chs_auto :: Channels
Chs_0 :: Channels
Chs_1 :: Channels
Chs_2 :: Channels

-- | VideoCodec
data VideoCodec
VC_H_264 :: VideoCodec

-- | ThumbnailFormat
data ThumbnailFormat
TF_png :: ThumbnailFormat

-- | Profile
data Profile
Pr_baseline :: Profile
Pr_main :: Profile
Pr_high :: Profile

-- | Level
data Level
Lv_1 :: Level
Lv_1b :: Level
Lv_1_1 :: Level
Lv_1_2 :: Level
Lv_1_3 :: Level
Lv_2 :: Level
Lv_2_1 :: Level
Lv_2_2 :: Level
Lv_3 :: Level
Lv_3_1 :: Level
Lv_3_2 :: Level
Lv_4 :: Level
Lv_4_1 :: Level

-- | PresetType
data PresetType
PTcustom :: PresetType
PTsystem :: PresetType

-- | BitRate
newtype BitRate
KbPerSec :: Int -> BitRate
_KbPerSec :: BitRate -> Int

-- | KeyFrameRate
newtype KeyFrameRate
KeyFrameRate :: Int -> KeyFrameRate
_KeyFrameRate :: KeyFrameRate -> Int

-- | FixedGOP
newtype FixedGOP
FixedGOP :: Bool -> FixedGOP
_FixedGOP :: FixedGOP -> Bool

-- | Interval
newtype Interval
Interval :: Int -> Interval
_Interval :: Interval -> Int

-- | MessagesSuccess
data MessagesSuccess
MessagesSuccess :: [Text] -> Bool -> MessagesSuccess
msMessages :: MessagesSuccess -> [Text]
msSuccess :: MessagesSuccess -> Bool

-- | <tt>auto</tt>, <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>
data AutoBool
ABauto :: AutoBool
ABtrue :: AutoBool
ABfalse :: AutoBool

-- | Text or Null
data TextOrNull
TNText :: Text -> TextOrNull
TNNull :: TextOrNull

-- | <tt>success</tt>
newtype SUCCESS
SUCCESS :: Bool -> SUCCESS
_SUCCESS :: SUCCESS -> Bool

-- | Ets error message
newtype EtsServiceError
ESE :: Text -> EtsServiceError
_ESE :: EtsServiceError -> Text

-- | <tt>true</tt>, <tt>false</tt>
bool_t :: Bool -> Text

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Core
data EtsQuery
EtsQuery :: Method -> Text -> Query -> Maybe Value -> EtsQuery
etsqMethod :: EtsQuery -> Method
etsqRequest :: EtsQuery -> Text
etsqQuery :: EtsQuery -> Query
etsqBody :: EtsQuery -> Maybe Value
data EtsConfiguration qt
EtsConfiguration :: Protocol -> ETSEndpoint -> Int -> NominalDiffTime -> EtsConfiguration qt
etsProtocol :: EtsConfiguration qt -> Protocol
etsEndpoint :: EtsConfiguration qt -> ETSEndpoint
etsPort :: EtsConfiguration qt -> Int
etsDefaultExpiry :: EtsConfiguration qt -> NominalDiffTime
etsConfiguration :: Protocol -> ETSEndpoint -> EtsConfiguration qt
data ETSEndpoint
etsEndpointUsEast :: ETSEndpoint
etsEndpointUsWest :: ETSEndpoint
etsEndpointUsWest2 :: ETSEndpoint
etsEndpointEu :: ETSEndpoint
etsEndpointApSouthEast :: ETSEndpoint
etsEndpointApNorthEast :: ETSEndpoint
endpoint :: ETSEndpoint -> ByteString
region :: ETSEndpoint -> ByteString
data EtsError
EtsError :: Status -> Text -> EtsError
etsStatusCode :: EtsError -> Status
etsErrorMessage :: EtsError -> Text
data EtsMetadata
EtsMetadata :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> EtsMetadata
etsMAmzId2 :: EtsMetadata -> Maybe Text
etsMRequestId :: EtsMetadata -> Maybe Text
etsSignQuery :: EtsQuery -> EtsConfiguration qt -> SignatureData -> SignedQuery
etsResponseConsumer :: IORef EtsMetadata -> HTTPResponseConsumer a -> HTTPResponseConsumer a
jsonConsumer :: FromJSON a => HTTPResponseConsumer a
instance Typeable EtsError
instance Typeable EtsMetadata
instance Show EtsQuery
instance Show ETSEndpoint
instance Show (EtsConfiguration qt)
instance Show EtsError
instance Show EtsMetadata
instance Loggable EtsMetadata
instance Monoid EtsMetadata
instance Exception EtsError
instance IsString ETSEndpoint
instance DefaultServiceConfiguration (EtsConfiguration NormalQuery)

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.CreateJob
data CreateJob
CreateJob :: JSInput -> JSOutput -> PipelineId -> CreateJob
cjInput :: CreateJob -> JSInput
cjOutput :: CreateJob -> JSOutput
cjPipelineId :: CreateJob -> PipelineId
data CreateJobResponse
CreateJobResponse :: JobId -> JSInput -> JSOutputStatus -> PipelineId -> CreateJobResponse
cjrId :: CreateJobResponse -> JobId
cjrInput :: CreateJobResponse -> JSInput
cjrOutput :: CreateJobResponse -> JSOutputStatus
cjrPipelineId :: CreateJobResponse -> PipelineId
createJob :: S3Object -> S3Object -> PresetId -> PipelineId -> CreateJob
defaultJSInput :: S3Object -> JSInput
defaultJSOutput :: S3Object -> PresetId -> JSOutput
instance Show CreateJob
instance Eq CreateJob
instance Show CreateJobResponse
instance Eq CreateJobResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse CreateJobResponse
instance Transaction CreateJob CreateJobResponse
instance ResponseConsumer CreateJob CreateJobResponse
instance SignQuery CreateJob

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.ListJobsByPipeline
data ListJobsByPipeline
ListJobsByPipeline :: PipelineId -> Bool -> TextOrNull -> ListJobsByPipeline
ljpPipelineId :: ListJobsByPipeline -> PipelineId
ljpAscending :: ListJobsByPipeline -> Bool
ljpPageToken :: ListJobsByPipeline -> TextOrNull
data ListJobsByPipelineResponse
ListJobsByPipelineResponse :: [JobSpecId] -> TextOrNull -> ListJobsByPipelineResponse
ljprJobs :: ListJobsByPipelineResponse -> [JobSpecId]
ljprNextPageToken :: ListJobsByPipelineResponse -> TextOrNull

instance Eq ListJobsByPipeline

instance ResponseConsumer UpdatePipelineStatus UpdatePipelineStatus
instance SignQuery UpdatePipelineStatus

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.UpdatePipelineNotifications
data UpdatePipelineNotifications
UpdatePipelineNotifications :: PipelineId -> Notifications -> UpdatePipelineNotifications
upnId :: UpdatePipelineNotifications -> PipelineId
upnNotifications :: UpdatePipelineNotifications -> Notifications
instance Show UpdatePipelineNotifications
instance Eq UpdatePipelineNotifications
instance AsMemoryResponse UpdatePipelineNotifications
instance Transaction UpdatePipelineNotifications UpdatePipelineNotifications
instance ResponseConsumer UpdatePipelineNotifications UpdatePipelineNotifications
instance SignQuery UpdatePipelineNotifications

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.DeletePipeline
data DeletePipeline
DeletePipeline :: PipelineId -> DeletePipeline
dpId :: DeletePipeline -> PipelineId
data DeletePipelineResponse
DeletePipelineResponse :: DeletePipelineResponse
instance Show DeletePipeline
instance Eq DeletePipeline
instance Show DeletePipelineResponse
instance Eq DeletePipelineResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse DeletePipelineResponse
instance Transaction DeletePipeline DeletePipelineResponse
instance ResponseConsumer DeletePipeline DeletePipelineResponse
instance SignQuery DeletePipeline

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.TestRole
data TestRole
TestRole :: S3Object -> S3Object -> IAMRole -> [SNSTopic] -> TestRole
trInputBucket :: TestRole -> S3Object
trOutputBucket :: TestRole -> S3Object
trRole :: TestRole -> IAMRole
trTopics :: TestRole -> [SNSTopic]
data TestRoleResponse
TestRoleResponse :: [Text] -> Bool -> TestRoleResponse
trrMessages :: TestRoleResponse -> [Text]
trrSuccess :: TestRoleResponse -> Bool
instance Show TestRole
instance Eq TestRole
instance Show TestRoleResponse
instance Eq TestRoleResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse TestRoleResponse
instance Transaction TestRole TestRoleResponse
instance ResponseConsumer TestRole TestRoleResponse
instance SignQuery TestRole

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.CreatePreset
data CreatePreset
CreatePreset :: PresetName -> Text -> Container -> Audio -> Video -> Thumbnails -> CreatePreset
cptName :: CreatePreset -> PresetName
cptDescription :: CreatePreset -> Text
cptContainer :: CreatePreset -> Container
cptAudio :: CreatePreset -> Audio
cptVideo :: CreatePreset -> Video
cptThumbnails :: CreatePreset -> Thumbnails
data CreatePresetResponse
CreatePresetResponse :: PresetName -> Text -> Container -> Audio -> Video -> Thumbnails -> PresetId -> PresetType -> Text -> CreatePresetResponse
cptrName :: CreatePresetResponse -> PresetName
cptrDescription :: CreatePresetResponse -> Text
cptrContainer :: CreatePresetResponse -> Container
cptrAudio :: CreatePresetResponse -> Audio
cptrVideo :: CreatePresetResponse -> Video
cptrThumbnails :: CreatePresetResponse -> Thumbnails
cptrId :: CreatePresetResponse -> PresetId
cptrType :: CreatePresetResponse -> PresetType
cptrWarning :: CreatePresetResponse -> Text
instance Show CreatePreset
instance Eq CreatePreset
instance Show CreatePresetResponse
instance Eq CreatePresetResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse CreatePresetResponse
instance Transaction CreatePreset CreatePresetResponse
instance ResponseConsumer CreatePreset CreatePresetResponse
instance SignQuery CreatePreset

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.ListPresets
data ListPresets
ListPresets :: ListPresets
newtype ListPresetsResponse
ListPresetsResponse :: [PresetResponse] -> ListPresetsResponse
lprPresets :: ListPresetsResponse -> [PresetResponse]
instance Show ListPresets
instance Eq ListPresets
instance Show ListPresetsResponse
instance Eq ListPresetsResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse ListPresetsResponse
instance Transaction ListPresets ListPresetsResponse
instance ResponseConsumer ListPresets ListPresetsResponse
instance SignQuery ListPresets

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.GetPreset
data GetPreset
GetPreset :: PresetId -> GetPreset
gprPreset :: GetPreset -> PresetId
data GetPresetResponse
GetPresetResponse :: PresetName -> Text -> Container -> Audio -> Video -> Thumbnails -> PresetId -> PresetType -> Text -> GetPresetResponse
gprrName :: GetPresetResponse -> PresetName
gprrDescription :: GetPresetResponse -> Text
gprrContainer :: GetPresetResponse -> Container
gprrAudio :: GetPresetResponse -> Audio
gprrVideo :: GetPresetResponse -> Video
gprrThumbnails :: GetPresetResponse -> Thumbnails
gprrId :: GetPresetResponse -> PresetId
gprrType :: GetPresetResponse -> PresetType
gprrWarning :: GetPresetResponse -> Text
instance Show GetPreset
instance Eq GetPreset
instance Show GetPresetResponse
instance Eq GetPresetResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse GetPresetResponse
instance Transaction GetPreset GetPresetResponse
instance ResponseConsumer GetPreset GetPresetResponse
instance SignQuery GetPreset

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder.Commands.DeletePreset
data DeletePreset
DeletePreset :: PresetId -> DeletePreset
dprId :: DeletePreset -> PresetId
data DeletePresetResponse
DeletePresetResponse :: DeletePresetResponse
instance Show DeletePreset
instance Eq DeletePreset
instance Show DeletePresetResponse
instance Eq DeletePresetResponse
instance AsMemoryResponse DeletePresetResponse
instance Transaction DeletePreset DeletePresetResponse
instance ResponseConsumer DeletePreset DeletePresetResponse
instance SignQuery DeletePreset

module Aws.ElasticTranscoder
